b:switch.b:if: That is AllEso es TodoIsso é Tudo

b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", postAuthor: , authorLabel: "", postDate: , dateLabel: "", postLabels: }

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-free-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-free-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets.FeaturedPost any w => w.sectionId == "featured"))

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:includable.b:tag: var exportify = { noTitle: "", postAuthor: , authorLabel: "", postDate: , dateLabel: "", postLabels: }

b:tag.cond: data:post.author.aboutMe or (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-free-related-posts") or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-free-post-footer-ads")
b:tag.name: footer

b:section.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isPost and (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "colorify-free-related-posts"))
b:section.name: Related Posts

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isSingleItem and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "sidebar"))

b:widget.title: $title={Follow By Email} $text={Subscribe to our mailing list to get the new updates.}
